name: Add leads to Odoo CRM from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in your Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and create a lead in Odoo CRM using information received. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1HMeSnS0arQamHb_Pton2zCjSz3TnSSPLClfWkiQnqc8/edit?usp=sharing).
